Positions for 2015 Season

Apple Hill Playhouse, a very active community theatre in Delmont, is seeking directors, designers, technicians, staff and stage managers for their 2015 summer season. Though not finalized, the 6 show season will include The World Goes Round (Kander & Ebb), Butterflies are Free (Leonard Gershe) and Chasing Manet (Tina Howe). Apple Hill is also seeking directors for the 3 show Johnny Appleseed Children's Theatre season, plays for and featuring children. Stipdends are provided for the afore-mentioned positions. If you are interested in working with Apple Hill, please submit a cover letter and resume to boxoffice@applehillplayhouse.org that includes the best phone number to contact you.
